utter_Welcome_fb_labs.wav.text: Hi This is Riya Calling from OneCard. This call is in regards to your Onecard bill repayment which was due on

utter_payment_missed_fblabs.wav.text: You have missed making payment towards your OneCard billed amount for month of

utter_fb_labs_confirm.wav.text: Please confirm when you will be making this payment. Today , Tomorrow or else specify a date.

utter_ask_for_refrence.wav.text: Thank you very much and Have a great day ahead.

utter_fb_labs_ThankYou.wav.text: May I know the name of the candidate.

utter_fblabs_liveAgentr.wav.text: Please hold for a moment , I will shortly connect you with a live agent

utter_fb_labs_confirmdate.wav.text: Please tell us the date when you made the payment.

utter_fb_labs_thankYouGreetings.wav.text: Thank you and have a nice day.

utter_fb_labs_callback.wav.text: Thanks you for your inputs. We will arrange a call back with our expert shortly .

utter_fb_labs_scheduleCallback.wav.text: Thank you , We will call you back.

utter_fblabs_liveAgentr.text: Response repeating again and again. Please wait while we transfer the call to live agent.

utter_fb_labs_reasonBot2.text: May I know the reason of not making the payment.

utter_fb_labs_CallbackBot1.text: Please suggest when can we call you back.
